result.title: Easy way of testing js code using node
result.content:
Codeforces uses d8 debug shell for testing js code. d8 provides IO functions, but if you don't want install d8 and you want testing your solutions using node, use this library https://github.com/Hapsidra/lol-io

P. S. if u know another easy way of testing, please leave a comment )
